title: Windows: unknown escape sequence: '\G' - GOROOT_FINAL - when building from sources
body:
by **czarek.tomczak**: 
Hi,

I am having problems with -lmingwex and -lmingw32 libraries missing that I reported in
issue #7265. So I tried to compile Go from sources.

I have installed mingw with gcc 4.8.2.

I'm trying to build Go 1.2, but I get these errors:

  C:\Go\src>all.bat
  # Building C bootstrap tool.
  cmd/dist
  cmd/dist/build.c:21:16: error: unknown escape sequence: '\G' [-Werror]
     char *goroot = GOROOT_FINAL;
                ^
  cmd/dist/build.c:22:22: error: unknown escape sequence: '\G' [-Werror]
     char *goroot_final = GOROOT_FINAL;
                      ^
  cc1: all warnings being treated as errors


I'm trying to build 32bit on Win7 64bit.

Thanks for help.
-Czarek
